nodes.text: The Chiss Hunter Settlement was a temporary settlement established by Chiss poachers in the Etyyy region on the Mid Rim world Kashyyyk.
The Chiss used single-room buildings built on poles. The settlement consisted of eleven such buildings, some grouped together, located in a small area of jungle near a river.
From here, the poachers under the lead of Laen Pieweto started their hunting expeditions into the Etyyy region and the surrounding jungles.
